Read the text and answer the following questions !    One day I flew from Denpasar to Makasar. I went with Kevin and Kathrin. Kevin is the Project Manager for Cool Radio English and Kathrin is the Program Officer for AuSAID.

The pilot said something over the intercom in Bahasa Indonesia. I did not understand him. I asked someone sitting near me for a clue. I looked out the window and could see the tires on my side of the plane lowering. I felt a little weak in the knees. I realized I had been holding my breath for a quite a while

1. From where the writer flew?

2. Who is Kevin?

3. Who is Kathrin?

4. Did the writer understand with Bahasa Indonesia?

5. What is the writer feeling when he looked out the window?


bantuin kak nyelesain misi, harus bener, salah report​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2.kevin is theProject Manager fot cool radio english

3.kathrin is the program officer for AuSaid

.

1. Denpasar

2. Kevin is the Project Manager for Cool Radio English

3. Kathrin is the Program Officer for AuSAID.

4. No, he did not.

5. He felt a little weak in the knees

related_questions.question: --bahasa inggris nya : biasanya ayam mempunyai bulu yang berbeda beda​

⬇QUIZ⬇

Sebutkan rumus simple last tense ! 

No ngasal​

answers.answer:
Verbal

  • (+) S + Verb₂ + o/c
  • (-) S + did not/didn’t + +Verb₁ + o/c
  • (?) Did + S + Verb₁ + o/c ?

Nominal

  • (+) S + to be (was/were) + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (-) S + to be (was/were) + not + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (?) To be (was/were) + S + Adj/Adv/Noun

Pembahasan

Simple past tense adalah sebuah kata kerja yang digunakan untuk berbicara tentang aktivitas masa lalu. Simple Past sendiri biasanya menggunakan past verb/verb 2. Keterangan waktu yang biasa digunakan yaitu last week, last night, last month, last year, yesterday dsb.

Contoh kalimat

Verbal

  • (+) She went to Jakarta yesterday
  • (-) She didn't go to Jakarta yesterday
  • (?) Did she go to Jakarta yesterday?

Nominal

  • (+) You were a student last year
  • (-) You were not a student last year
  • (?) Were you a student last year?

Pelajari lebih lanjut

  • 1.rumus simpel past tense dan berikan 3 contoh kalitugas: brainly.co.id/tugas/29713480
  • berikan 15 contoh simple past tense beserta positif, negatif dan interogatif ?? : brainly.co.id/tugas/14440709
  • buatlah 5 kalimat past tense (+) (-) (?) : brainly.co.id/tugas/24486587

Detail jawaban

Kelas : 8

Mapel : Bahasa Inggris

Materi : Chapter 9 — Past tense

Kode Mapel : 5

Kode Kategorisasi : 8.5.9

Jawaban:

Pantun adalah salah satu puisi lama yang baris pertama kedua merupakan sampiran dan baris ketiga keempat yaitu isi, mempunyai 4 baris, Setiap barisnya mempunyai 8-12 Kosakata (cara menghitungnya dengan cara dipenggal seperti, ayah: a-yah)

wattiini waz zaituun

watuuri siiniin

wahaadzal baladil amiin

illal ladziina aamanuu wa’amilus shoolihaati falahum ajrun ghoiru mamnuun
